General.Name: Henan Xinye Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Xinye Textile Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of medium and high-end cotton textiles in China and internationally. Its products include cotton, blended yarns and fabrics, and yarn dyed fabrics; and grey fabric, includes home textiles and apparel fabrics. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Xinyang, China.
